mapper.insert: insert into community(u_id, c_title, c_contents, c_date) values(#{u_id},#{c_title},#{c_contents}, now())
mapper.select: select * from community order by c_num DESC limit #{pageStart}, #{amount}
select count(*) as total from community
mapper.update: update community set c_title = #{c_title}, c_contents = #{c_contents}, c_date = now() where c_num = #{c_num}
mapper.delete: delete c, r from community c left join reply r on (c.c_num = r.c_num) where c.c_num = #{c_num}
